original_title: Live from Covent Garden - Royal Opera House
overview: Live from Covent Garden will celebrate ballet and opera in programmes of dance and music, curated by artistic directors of the Royal Opera House: Antonio Pappano, Music Director of The Royal Opera, Oliver Mears, Director of Opera, and Kevin Oâ€™Hare, Director of The Royal Ballet.
title: Live from Covent Garden - Royal Opera House
